system.description: This spell functions like symbol of death, except that all creatures within the radius of a symbol of persuasion instead become charmed by the caster (as charm monster) for 1 hour per caster level. Unlike symbol of death, symbol of persuasion has no hit point limit; once triggered, it remains active for 10 minutes per caster level. A rogue can use Search (DC 31) to find it and Disable Device (DC 31) to thwart it.

components.materialDescription: Mercury and phosphorus, plus powdered diamond and opal with a total value of at least 5,000 gp.

system.target: One symbol drawn on a surface
